page.title: 12MORE GAMES
page.content: {CYCLE TAG}Mostly played by boys inside a big square using cycles and a stick about a metre long on grass . Choose one to be it.The rest have 5 seconds to get away.He then chases to try to tag one of them .If he does the game restarts with a new person as it. {SEVENS}Mostly played by girls using a tennis or similar ball against a wall. You start off by throwing the ball up and catching it 7 times, then 6 times throw the ball at the wall and let it bounce before catching it. Next come 5 bounces on the ground using the palm of your hand, then 4 throws in the air then catch it.For 3 throw the ball under your leg at the wall,catch it after it bounces,next twice throw the ball at the wall,touch the ground and catch the ball.Lastly throw the ball against the wall turn in a circle and catch the ball.
